verses.verse: Now David<WH1732> was old<WH2204> and full<WH7646> of days;<WH3117> and he made Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121> king<WH4427> over Israel.<WH3478>
He gathered together<WH622> all the princes<WH8269> of Israel,<WH3478> with the priests<WH3548> and the Levites.<WH3881>

The Levites<WH3881> were numbered<WH5608> from thirty<WH7970> years<WH1121> old and upward:<WH4605> and their number<WH4557> by their polls,<WH1538> man<WH1397> by man,<WH1397> was thirty<WH7970> - eight<WH8083> thousand.<WH505>

David said,<WH428> "Of these, twenty<WH6242> - four<WH702> thousand<WH505> were to oversee<WH5329> the work<WH4399> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh;<WH3068> six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> were officers<WH7860> and judges;<WH8199>
four<WH702> thousand<WH505> were doorkeepers;<WH7778> and four<WH702> thousand<WH505> praised<WH1984> Yahweh<WH3068> with the instruments<WH3627> which I made,<WH6213> for giving praise.<WH1984>"
David<WH1732> divided<WH2505> them into divisions<WH4256> according to the sons<WH1121> of Levi:<WH3878> Gershon,<WH1648> Kohath,<WH6955> and Merari.<WH4847>
Of the Gershonites:<WH1649> Ladan<WH3936> and Shimei.<WH8096>
The sons<WH1121> of Ladan:<WH3936> Jehiel<WH3171> the chief,<WH7218> and Zetham,<WH2241> and Joel,<WH3100> three.<WH7969>
The sons<WH1121> of Shimei:<WH8096> Shelomoth,<WH8019> and Haziel,<WH2381> and Haran,<WH2039> three.<WH7969> These were the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' households of Ladan.<WH3936>
The sons<WH1121> of Shimei:<WH8096> Jahath,<WH3189> Zina,<WH2126> and Jeush,<WH3266> and Beriah.<WH1283> These four<WH702> were the sons<WH1121> of Shimei.<WH8096>

Jahath<WH3189> was the chief,<WH7218> and Zizah<WH2125> the second:<WH8145> but Jeush<WH3266> and Beriah<WH1283> didn't<WH7235> have many sons;<WH1121> therefore they became a fathers<WH1>' house<WH1004> in one<WH259> reckoning.<WH6486>
The sons<WH1121> of Kohath:<WH6955> Amram,<WH6019> Izhar,<WH3324> Hebron,<WH2275> and Uzziel,<WH5816> four.<WH702>

The sons<WH1121> of Amram:<WH6019> Aaron<WH175> and Moses;<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> was separated,<WH914> that he should sanctify<WH6942> the most<WH6944> holy things,<WH6944> he and his sons,<WH1121> <WH5704> forever,<WH5769> to burn incense<WH6999> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> to minister<WH8334> to him,<WH1288> and to bless in his name,<WH8034> <WH5704> forever.<WH5769>
But as for Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> his sons<WH1121> were named<WH7121> among the tribe<WH7626> of Levi.<WH3878>
The sons<WH1121> of Moses:<WH4872> Gershom<WH1647> and Eliezer.<WH461>
The sons<WH1121> of Gershom:<WH1647> Shebuel<WH7619> the chief.<WH7218>

The sons<WH1121> of Eliezer<WH461> were:<WH7345> Rehabiah the chief;<WH7218> and Eliezer<WH461> had no other<WH312> sons;<WH1121> but the sons<WH1121> of Rehabiah<WH7345> were very<WH4605> many.<WH7235>
The sons<WH1121> of Izhar:<WH3324> Shelomith<WH8019> the chief.<WH7218>
The sons<WH1121> of Hebron:<WH2275> Jeriah<WH3404> the chief,<WH7218> Amariah<WH568> the second,<WH8145> Jahaziel<WH3166> the third,<WH7992> and Jekameam<WH3360> the fourth.<WH7243>
The sons<WH1121> of Uzziel:<WH5816> Micah<WH4318> the chief,<WH7218> and Isshiah<WH3449> the second.<WH8145>
The sons<WH1121> of Merari:<WH4847> Mahli<WH4249> and Mushi.<WH4187> The sons<WH1121> of Mahli:<WH4249> Eleazar<WH499> and Kish.<WH7027>
Eleazar<WH499> died,<WH4191> and had no sons,<WH1121> but daughters<WH1323> only:<WH251> and their brothers the sons<WH1121> of Kish<WH7027> took them as wives.<WH5375>
The sons<WH1121> of Mushi:<WH4187> Mahli,<WH4249> and Eder,<WH5740> and Jeremoth,<WH3406> three.<WH7969>

These were the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> after their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> even the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' houses of those who were counted<WH6485> individually,<WH4557> in the number of names<WH8034> by their polls,<WH1538> who did<WH6213> the work<WH4399> for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH1121> old<WH1121> and upward.<WH4605>
For David<WH1732> said,<WH559> "Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> has given rest<WH5117> to his people;<WH5971> and he dwells<WH7931> in Jerusalem<WH3389> forever.<WH5769>
Also the Levites<WH3881> will no longer need to carry<WH5375> the tabernacle<WH4908> and all its vessels<WH3627> for its service.<WH5656>"
For by the last<WH314> words<WH1697> of David<WH1732> the sons of Levi<WH3881> were numbered,<WH4557> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward.<WH4605>

For their office<WH4612> was to wait<WH3027> on the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> in the courts,<WH2691> and in the rooms,<WH3957> and in the purifying<WH2893> of all holy things,<WH6944> even the work<WH4639> of the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God;<WH430>

for the show bread<WH3899> also,<WH5560> and for the fine flour for a meal offering,<WH4503> whether of unleavened<WH4682> wafers,<WH7550> or of that which is baked in the pan,<WH4227> or of that which is soaked,<WH7246> and for all kinds of measure<WH4884> and size;<WH4060>
and to stand<WH5975> every morning<WH1242> to thank<WH3034> and praise<WH1984> Yahweh,<WH3068> and likewise in the evening;<WH6153>

and to offer<WH5927> all burnt offerings<WH5930> to Yahweh,<WH3068> on the Sabbaths,<WH7676> on the new moons,<WH2320> and on the set feasts,<WH4150> in number<WH4557> according to the ordinance<WH4941> concerning them,<WH8548> continually before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068>

and that they should keep<WH8104> the duty<WH4931> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and the duty<WH4931> of the holy<WH6944> place,<WH4931> and the duty of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> their brothers,<WH251> for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
